pc_extras_clocks.description: Clocks tied to PC extras, artifact awakening, and persistent consequences created mid-session.

insaerndel_search_for_arisann.name: Search for Arisann (Sister)
insaerndel_search_for_arisann.description: Tracking Arisann's trail through rumors, dream-signs, and the Rift wilds.
insaerndel_search_for_arisann.completion_effect: You locate Arisann (or her confirmed trail) and trigger the next arc step.
advancement_triggers: Meaningful lead from a credible source (+1)
Recovered personal item or verified sighting (+2)
Dream/vision provides a usable location clue (+1)
Confront someone who benefited from her disappearance (+1 to +2)
story_hooks: At 2/8: A lead points toward the Rift's backroads and a name you don't recognize
At 4/8: A clue implicates a faction or patron who doesn't want questions
At 6/8: Evidence suggests Arisann is moving (or being moved) intentionally
At 8/8: Contact/encounter with Arisann or a decisive revelation

insaerndel_respect_in_the_rift.name: Building Respect within the Rift
insaerndel_respect_in_the_rift.description: Your local reputation grows—useful for status, protection, and the path toward Thane-level regard.
insaerndel_respect_in_the_rift.completion_effect: You achieve major standing in the Rift (formal recognition or power-broker status).
advancement_triggers: Help a notable citizen or solve a local crisis (+1 to +2)
Complete a high-profile guild win without public scandal (+1)
Outmaneuver a rival faction/patron quietly (+1 to +2)
Protect Riften's interests during larger political chaos (+2)
setback_triggers: Public scandal tied to your name (-1 to -2)
Being exposed as a wanted Dominion traitor (-2)

insaerndel_thalmor_search_clock.name: Dream Catcher's Identity & Location Uncovered
insaerndel_thalmor_search_clock.description: The Thalmor tighten the net around the Dream Catcher of Dusk.
insaerndel_thalmor_search_clock.completion_effect: The Thalmor confirm your identity and location—launching an overwhelming response and long-term consequences.
advancement_triggers: A witness survives a Thalmor encounter (+2)
Your cover identity is challenged publicly (+1)
You leave a signature trail (magic, documents, contacts) (+1)
An informant reports a matching description (+1)
setback_triggers: You eliminate a key investigator or handler (-1)
You destroy evidence linking you to the Dream Catcher identity (-1)
story_hooks: At 2/8: Increased surveillance and probing questions in civilized spaces
At 4/8: Coordinated ambushes and framed incidents begin
At 6/8: A named Justiciar (recurring antagonist) takes personal interest
At 8/8: Major strike operation / bounty escalation / faction-wide alert
